attributes.action: explain the origin and people responsible for the creation of toxic debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hear the words"TOXIC DEBT"sounds very nasty,but we deserve more clarity on these words.
If this debt exists then the debtors must exist also..WHO ARE THEY?????
Lets name names and apportion this fiasco to someone or some thing,lets not just make up a name for it and expect that to be enough to convince the public that throwing tax payers money at this problem is the solution.
Is a SOCIALISTIC answer to a CAPITALISTIC problem??If so why in the name of GOD did the LABOUR PARTY parade under a banner of NEW LABOUR??
The public{taxpayers}want more information on where thier money is going and also a time scale as to when they can see some sort of return in thier investments.
As time draws near to an end of the NEW LABOUR as these lightening strikes over jobs for British workers, let the P.M. at least have the courage to face up to the nations questions.............
